text: The 2016–17 U.S. Virgin Islands Championship was the 14th edition of the competition. The season began on 30 October 2016 and ended on 12 February 2017. The championship itself was a four-team tournament that determined the domestic champion of the U.S. Virgin Islands, based on the top two finishers in the St. Croix and St. Thomas Leagues. The defending champions, Raymix, successfully defended their title, defeating Helenites, 1–0, in the championship. ==Regular season== === St. Croix Soccer League === Helenites and Rovers qualified. === St. Thomas Soccer League === Raymix and Positive Vibes Victory qualified. == Tournament == === Results === ==== Semifinals ==== \---- ==== Consolation match ==== ==== Final ==== == References == Category:U.S. Virgin Islands Championship seasons United States Virgin Islands football football
title: 2016–17 U.S. Virgin Islands Championship
